|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox M200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = ML3AE8 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);T1042; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL032N90TFI04; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SD Card |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Transcend;; |fla2chipmodelfull = <!-- Flash2 full chip info --> |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DIMM3L |ram1type1 = U-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Transcend;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1543; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6171R; |wan_ports = 3 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.07;; |stockos = Linux;3.12.19-rt30;WatchGuard Fireware OS v12.4.1.B595401;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, power switch, heatsink, fan, metal case |addchip = I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, Hardware Monitor;Winbond;W83793G;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;2;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;2;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7694;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;TI;SN74LVC08A;;3;,,, SPI Interface Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3205;;1;,,, Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS3669S;;1;,,, 4.5V-17V Input 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54320;;4;,,, 16-bit Transparent D-Type Latch w/3-State Output;TI;SN74AVC16373;;1;,,, Single-Phase D-CAP/CAP2 Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51518;;1;,,, 40A Synchronous Buck Gate Driver;International Rectifier;IR3553;;2;,,, Dual Output Digital Multi-Phase Controller;International Rectifier;IR3570B;;1;,,, 350MHz Clock Frequency Synthesizer;Integrated Circuit Systems;ICS8431I-21;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 06/30/2023 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00WYOVLOO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Project:Network/Hardware Specific/WatchGuard|WatchGuard}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' T1042 (@1.2GHz) :Quad Core 64-bit e5500 PowerPC *Memory: 2GB DDR3L U-DIMM *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card *Network: 8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 100-240V C13
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/Firebox_M200_M300_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide] {{â€¢}} [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/Firebox_M200_M300_quickstartguide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
